extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: ORDER of Detention pending trial as to defendant Jorge Espinoza-Salinas. Ordered by Magistrate Judge Thomas D. Thalken.(MKR)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Espinoza-Salinas
titleInfo.subTitle: PRELIMINARY ORDER OF FORFEITURE sustaining 20 Motion for Preliminary Forfeiture as to Jorge Espinoza-Salinas (1). The US Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms for the District of Nebraska ("ATF") is hereby authorized to seize the Rohm.22 caliber pistol, serial number 10157971. Defendant's interest in said property is hereby forfeited to the USA for disposition in accordance with the law. The aforementioned forfeited property is to be held by ATF in its secure custody and control. Upon adjudication of all third party interests, this Court will enter a Final Order of Forfeiture. Ordered by Judge Lyle E. Strom. Certified copy to the USM. (JSF)

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: PRELIMINARY ORDER OF FORFEITURE sustaining 20 Motion for Preliminary Forfeiture as to Jorge Espinoza-Salinas (1). The US Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms for the District of Nebraska ("ATF") is hereby authorized to seize the Rohm.22 caliber pistol, serial number 10157971. Defendant's interest in said property is hereby forfeited to the USA for disposition in accordance with the law. The aforementioned forfeited property is to be held by ATF in its secure custody and control. Upon adjudication of all third party interests, this Court will enter a Final Order of Forfeiture. Ordered by Judge Lyle E. Strom. Certified copy to the USM. (JSF)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Espinoza-Salinas
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER granting 23 motion to continue as to Jorge Espinoza-Salinas (1) - Sentencing set for 1/17/2008 09:00 AM in Courtroom 5 (Omaha) before Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. (JDR)

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: ORDER granting 23 motion to continue as to Jorge Espinoza-Salinas (1) - Sentencing set for 1/17/2008 09:00 AM in Courtroom 5 (Omaha) before Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. (JDR)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Espinoza-Salinas
titleInfo.subTitle: FINAL ORDER OF FORFEITURE - Plaintiff's Motion 25 for Final Order of Forfeiture is hereby sustained. All right, title and interest in and to the Rohm.22 caliber pistol, serial number 10157971, held by any person or entity, is hereby forever barred and foreclosed. The said property is forfeited to the United States of America. The United States Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms for the District of Nebraska is directed to dispose of said property in accordance with law, as to Jorge Espinoza-Salinas (1). Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. (1 Certified copy to USM)( JAE, )

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: FINAL ORDER OF FORFEITURE - Plaintiff's Motion 25 for Final Order of Forfeiture is hereby sustained. All right, title and interest in and to the Rohm.22 caliber pistol, serial number 10157971, held by any person or entity, is hereby forever barred and foreclosed. The said property is forfeited to the United States of America. The United States Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms for the District of Nebraska is directed to dispose of said property in accordance with law, as to Jorge Espinoza-Salinas (1). Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. (1 Certified copy to USM)( JAE, )

titleInfo.title: USA v. Espinoza-Salinas
titleInfo.subTitle: JUDGMENT as to Jorge Espinoza-Salinas (1), Defendant plead guilty to Counts I&II of the Superseding Indictment and is committed to the Bureau of Prisons for 14 months; 3 years supervised release with special conditions; $100 special assessment (remitted); the Indictment is dismissed on the motion of the United States as to this defendant only; final order of forfeiture filed on 12/7/07 as to Count II; the defendant shall forfeit the defendant's interest in the following property to the United States: Rohm.22 caliber pistol, serial number 10157971; Criminal Case Terminated as to defendant Jorge Espinoza-Salinas. Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. (4 Certified copies to USM)(CJP)

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: JUDGMENT as to Jorge Espinoza-Salinas (1), Defendant plead guilty to Counts I&II of the Superseding Indictment and is committed to the Bureau of Prisons for 14 months; 3 years supervised release with special conditions; $100 special assessment (remitted); the Indictment is dismissed on the motion of the United States as to this defendant only; final order of forfeiture filed on 12/7/07 as to Count II; the defendant shall forfeit the defendant's interest in the following property to the United States: Rohm.22 caliber pistol, serial number 10157971; Criminal Case Terminated as to defendant Jorge Espinoza-Salinas. Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. (4 Certified copies to USM)(CJP)
